content: I had tried out the Block Reference module but didn't really see the utility of it until I put it in a Paragraph. The Drupal site I'm migrating uses the Shortcode module so we could insert blocks anywhere inside body fields. I was struggling with how to do that in Backdrop. Using paragraph types, including a block reference, works great. Probably better, no more searching for the shortcode. https://backdropcms.org/project/blockreference
